overview: Bertrand is co-founder of Bragster.com, the social network for daredevils where people can dare their friends and post video evidence of their challenges. Before that, he worked at the Boston Consulting Group, and at Amazon.com where he launched the DVD Rental business across Europe. Bertrand holds an MBA from the Harvard Business School (Baker Scholar) and was finalist of the MIT Business Plan Contest with Agrivida (www.agrivida.com).
